name: Emergency Dispatch Exchange
voice_tone: urgent, calm, confident, we’ll handle this for you
geo: United States; global for high-stress sourcing (generators, pumps)
ticket_estimated: High (USD 300–2k per visit; tens of thousands for roofing / storm insurance jobs)
notes: 24/7 capture. Ask ZIP, issue, urgency. Lock dispatch via Stripe + DocuSign. Push job to vetted local provider.

name: Federal Micro‑Purchase Fastlane
voice_tone: professional, compliant, straight to availability and delivery terms
geo: US Federal / State / Municipal / Critical Infra (nationwide)
notes: Fast quote < $15k, purchase card, DocuSign terms, Stripe link. Rapid sourcing for pumps/generators/safety gear.

name: Residential Solar Lock‑In
notes: Close homeowners before incentive windows close. Installers pay high for hot leads.
